page.title: 03POPULATION The Newcomers
page.content: When our parents were at school nearly all of the children in{Thornaby}were from English families.Now there are many children whose parents were born in India and Pakistan.The mothers of these children usually wear long,brightly coloured clothes,but their fathers wear ordinary English clothes. Some of the men wear turbans. Many shops in{Westbury Street}and{ {Lanehouse Road}are owned by Indians and Pakistanis. The owners work very hard and their shops are open until ten o'clock at night. Their children go to ordinary schools and they speak good English.Sometimes the children have to speak for their parents in shops and schools because the parents cannot speak English. On Fridays many children go to the Mosque in Westbury St.to be taught about their religion.
